code_value: ets_th1 Excuse me, I don’t know how to use this new smart phone.</br>ets_th2 How are you doing in the school these days?</br>ets_th3 You look tired and sleepy. What happened?</br>ets_th4 We’ll have a party tomorrow night and I hope you can come.
